- Financial Concepts Accuracy: The student explicitly presented the after‑tax cost‑of‑debt formula, computed a concrete after‑tax rate, and used the tax‑shield concept to justify leveraging recommendations—demonstrating both correct application and meaningful interpretation. - Technical Implementation: The student reports input data and outputs numeric market-value weights, but under the STRICT technical standard they fail to explicitly demonstrate personal execution, block‑by‑block implementation, or ownership (no "I ran this code", no code walkthrough showing how market values were computed).
